description: This file contains utility functions for a Streamlit-based AI tutoring application, including session management, chat history export, tool call display, and sidebar widgets for user interaction.

methods.name: add_message
methods.description: Adds a message to the session state with specified role, content, and optional tool calls.

methods.name: restart_agent
methods.description: Resets the agent and clears chat history in the session state.

methods.name: export_chat_history
methods.description: Exports the chat history as a markdown formatted string.

methods.name: display_tool_calls
methods.description: Displays a list of tool call results within a Streamlit container with expandable sections.

methods.name: sidebar_widget
methods.description: Creates a sidebar with sample user queries and utility buttons for the Llama Tutor app.

methods.name: session_selector_widget
methods.description: Displays a session selector in the sidebar, allowing users to switch between sessions.

methods.name: rename_session_widget
methods.description: Provides UI to rename the current session and save changes.

methods.name: about_widget
methods.description: Displays an about section describing the Llama Tutor application.
